articles.description: Chet Holmgren and Paolo Banchero wasted little time proving they belonged. We break down the young players and cores that intrigued the most in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
With a week of NBA summer league action in the books, we check in with our writers on the scene to see who and what has stood out the most in Las Vegas.

articles.title: How Tony Romo foresees Jimmy Garoppolo trade saga playing out - NBC Sports
articles.description: NFL on CBS analyst and former Dallas Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo joins the Zach Gelb Show to share his thoughts on the Jimmy Garoppolo situation.
articles.content:
To say it has been a tumultuous offseason for 49ers QB Jimmy Garoppolo is an understatement.

articles.title: N'Keal Harry embraces new home with Chicago Bears - NBC Sports
articles.description: N'Keal Harry seems happy about his trade to Chicago with recent Twitter post.
articles.content:
N'Keal Harry seems ready to join his new team with the Chicago Bears.
